definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The ratio of commissions to be collected shall be set in accordance with the principle of making an inverse ratio to the auction completion price.
sentences.chinese: 收取佣金的比例按照同拍賣成交價成反比的原則確定。

sentences.english: The company had to kickback a lot to the corrupt officer.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司必須給腐敗的政府官員很大一筆佣金。

sentences.english: Honestly, the rate of commi ion you are going to grant us is far too small.
sentences.chinese: 說實話，你方給我們的導航已取消怎麼辦佣金太少了。

sentences.english: The above price includes your commission of2%.
sentences.chinese: 上述價格包括你方2%佣金。

sentences.english: M: Mmm, we usually pay around 8 percent, I think.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我們通常是支付8%左右的佣金。
他以抽取佣金的方式銷售汽車。

sentences.english: In that case we may consider giving you a 8% commission.
sentences.chinese: 如果是這樣的話，我們可以考慮給你8%的佣金。

sentences.english: The commision we get usually are 10% of the amount of each transaction.
sentences.chinese: 通常我們取得的佣金是每筆成交額的10%。

sentences.english: By agent, I mean that your company may sell the products on behalf of my company and receives commisions .
sentences.chinese: 代理商指的是貴公司以抽佣金方式賣我公司的產品。

sentences.english: We will deduct the premium from your commission of 5% payable to you.
sentences.chinese: 我們將從支付你方的百分之五的佣金中扣除保險費。

sentences.english: In order to make profit, Insurance Brokerage Company must expand quickly.
sentences.chinese: 而保險經紀公司，主要靠提取期交保單續期佣金。

sentences.english: Jack, here is your comission for doing the work.
sentences.chinese: 傑克，這是你做這份工作的佣金。

sentences.english: He had 800 sales people working on commission two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 兩年前他僱傭了800名按佣金計酬的銷售人員。

sentences.english: If you worked with us, how much commission would you expect?
sentences.chinese: 如果你和我們合作，你希望得到多少佣金？

sentences.english: We wish to be your agent in our district if the commission rate is favorable.
sentences.chinese: 如佣金率優惠，我們願意做你方在我們地區的代理。

sentences.english: We request you to deduct our commission from the invoice.
sentences.chinese: 我們請求你方從發票中扣除我們的佣金。
